abstract: The author of “The Party” discusses China’s Communist Party, its likely next leader and the prospects of its continued rule in coming decades.
snippet: The author of “The Party” discusses China’s Communist Party, its likely next leader and the prospects of its continued rule in coming decades.
lead_paragraph: Today’s Book Chat is with Richard McGregor, who spent much of the last decade in China as a correspondent for The Financial Times and recently became the newspaper’s Washington bureau chief. His recent book, “The Party,” tries to do what few if any other English-language books have done before: profile China’s ruling body, the Communist Party.
